name: Payment Plans in Billing tab should be listed based on Program and Bill type and program as Large Deductible

testSteps.description: 1: Payment Plans in Billing tab should be listed based on Program and Bill type and program as Large Deductible ({StreetAddress=2800 Roland Rd, City=Fairbanks, Zip=99709, Country=United States, RiskState=Alaska, LargeDeductibleFactor=0.89, LossAdjustmentFactor=1.2000, VariableExpenseFactor=0.92, ExcessAndExpenseFactor=0.35, DeductibleAmount=100000})

children.description: Given underwriter has ability to create quote

And select program
| program |
| Large Deductible |
And with insured address and location as '2800 Roland Rd', 'Fairbanks', 'Alaska', '99709', 'United States'
And with Large Deductible Amount is 100000

And with Account Insurance details as
| Code | PremiumNotSubjectToInsuranceSplit | PremiumNotSubjectToInsurancePremium | PremiumSubjectToInsuranceSplit | PremiumSubjectToInsurancePremium |
| W01 | 1000000 | 1000 | 1000000 | 1000 |

And with Collateral and Deposit details
| CCollateralCheck | CFormulaPriColl | CFormulaSecColl | CRequestPriColl | CRequestSecColl |
| Y | 5000 | 2000 | 10000 | 1000 |
When underwriter calculates premium for quote
And underwriter is on home page
And underwriter navigates to Payment Plan

Then Bill type should have the following options
| Direct Bill |
| Wholesale Bill |

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given underwriter has ability to create quote
And select program
And with insured address and location as '<StreetAddress>', '<City>', '<RiskState>', '<Zip>', '<Country>'
And with Primary State is '<RiskState>'
And with Large Deductible Amount is <DeductibleAmount>
And with Risk State is '<RiskState>'
And with Large DeductibleFactor is '<LargeDeductibleFactor>','<LossAdjustmentFactor>', '<VariableExpenseFactor>', '<ExcessAndExpenseFactor>'
And with Account Insurance details as
And with Collateral and Deposit details
When underwriter calculates premium for quote
And underwriter is on home page
And underwriter opens newly created 'quote'
And underwriter navigates to Payment Plan
Then Bill type should have the following options
